analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
kenacid viññeyya duka sani dassana ttika

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhamma

original: paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci
analyzed: paṭicca kenaci na viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kenaci

original: viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca kenaci na viññeyyaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
analyzed: na kenacid na viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca na kenacid na viññeyyam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca tīṇi yeva sabbattha nava

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṁ navapañhaṁ kātabbaṁ. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighamūlassa nava pañhāyeva.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na anidassana sappaṭighassa purima sadisam nava pañham na kenacid viññeyyam na anidassana appaṭigha mūlassa nava pañhāya iva

original: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava
